00044 #include <Inventor/nodes/SoNode.h> 
00045 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00046 
00047 #include "FieldContainerWidget.h"
00048 #include "ParametersDelegate.h"
00049 #include "ParametersView.h"
00050 #include "Trace.h"
00051 #include "TShapeKit.h"
00052 
00053 ParametersView::ParametersView( QWidget* parent , Qt::WindowFlags f )
00054 : QWidget(parent, f), m_ptabWidget( 0 ), m_actualCoinNode( 0 )
00055 {
00056 
00057         m_ptabWidget = new QTabWidget;
00058     m_ptabWidget->addTab( new FieldContainerWidget( 0, "" ), tr("Transform") );
00059     m_ptabWidget->addTab( new FieldContainerWidget( 0, "" ), tr("Shape") );
00060     
00061     
00062     
00063     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout;
00064     layout->addWidget( m_ptabWidget );
00065     setLayout( layout );
00066                 
00067 }
00068 
00069 ParametersView::~ParametersView()
00070 {
00071         Trace trace( "ParametersView::~ParametersView", false );
00072         
00073 }
00074 void ParametersView::ChangeParameters( SoBaseKit* coinNode )
00075 {
00076         Trace trace( "ParametersView::ChangeParameters", false );
00077         
00078         if ( coinNode )
00079         {
00080                 QString type = coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString();
00081                 
00082                 SoBaseKit* nodeKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinNode );
00083                 if ( type == "TLightKit" )
00084                 {
00085                         QStringList parts;
00086                         parts<<QString( "transform" )<<QString( "icon" )<<QString( "tsunshape" );
00087                         
00088                         SelectionChanged( nodeKit, parts, false );
00089         
00090                                 
00091                 }
00092                 else    
00093                 {
00094                         QStringList parts;
00095                         parts<<QString( "transform" );
00096                         
00097                         SelectionChanged( nodeKit, parts );
00098                         
00099                         if( type == "TShapeKit" )  
00100                         {
00101                                 parts<<QString( "shape" )<<QString( "appearance.material" );
00102                         }
00103                         SelectionChanged( nodeKit, parts );
00104                 }
00105                 
00106 
00107         }
00108         else
00109         {
00110                 m_ptabWidget->addTab( new FieldContainerWidget( 0, ""  ), tr("Transform") );
00111         }
00112 }
00113 
00114 void ParametersView::SelectionChanged( SoBaseKit* coinNode, QStringList parts, bool editable )
00115 {
00116         Trace trace( "ParametersView::SelectionChanged", false );
00117         
00118         m_ptabWidget->clear();
00119         m_actualCoinNode = coinNode;
00120         
00121         for( int i = 0; i< parts.size(); i++ )
00122         {
00123                 QString partName = parts[i];
00124                 SoNode* coinPart = coinNode->getPart(partName.toStdString().c_str(), false );
00125                 if( coinPart ) AddTab( coinPart, partName, editable );
00126         }
00127 }
00128 
00129 void ParametersView::AddTab( SoNode* coinNode, QString partName, bool editable )
00130 {
00131         Trace trace( "ParametersView::AddTab", false );
00132         
00133         QString type = coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString();
00134         
00135         FieldContainerWidget* nodeContainer = new FieldContainerWidget( coinNode, partName, this );
00136         nodeContainer->SetEditable( editable );
00137         m_ptabWidget->addTab( nodeContainer, type );
00138         connect(nodeContainer, SIGNAL( valueModificated( const QStringList& , QString ) ), this, SLOT( valueModification( const QStringList& , QString ) ) );   
00139                 
00140 }
00141 
00142 void ParametersView::valueModification( const QStringList& oldValuesList, QString containerName )
00143 {
00144         Trace trace( "ParametersView::valueModification", false );
00145         emit valueModificated( oldValuesList, m_actualCoinNode, containerName );
00146 }
00147 
00148 void ParametersView::Reset()
00149 {
00150         Trace trace( "ParametersView::Reset", false );
00151         FieldContainerWidget* containerWidget = static_cast< FieldContainerWidget* >(m_ptabWidget->currentWidget() );
00152         if( containerWidget )containerWidget->Reset();
00153 }
